info.name: Dark Mode for Zalo Web (2023)
info.description:
Dark mode for Zalo Web (v1.3), 
this stylish affected both login and chat screen, ...
-
Don't be shy to report the bug /issue to us in Comment /Email: quangdd98@gmail.com
-
//For Dark mode for Zalo PC, please visit: http://quangdd.com/2023/04/01/blackzalo-pc/
info.additionalInfo:
Change log:

Updated in v1.3 (May 26, 2023):
Fix blinded in Reply a message with File in chat.

Updated in v1.2 (Apr 01, 2023):
Fix blinded in Voting area & notification of member in/out group.
//Thank to 10NC - Nguyễn Ngọc Phúc for reporting this issue to us.
-
Minor bugs:
Blacken all password arena (both input space & auto-filled password) when use Password autofill in Login via account in Login screen.

Updated in v1.1 (Jan 07, 2023):
Fix some issue with CSS style.

Updated in v1.0 (Dec 29, 2022):
Dark mode for Zalo Web interface in both login and chat screen, ...
